impact() - Method in class model.brick.Brick
This method weaken the strength of the brick, and update the state of the brick according to its state.

This method sets the probability to break the steel brick.

This method checks if the player has contacted with the ball.
impactBorder() - Method in class model.wall.Wall
This method checks the interaction of the ball and the horizontal border of the game frame.
impactWall() - Method in class model.wall.Wall
This method checks the interaction between the ball and the wall, and reverses the movement of the ball according to which side of the brick the ball has interacted, and cracks the if the brick is cement brick.
increaseGameDifficulty() - Method in class model.wall.Wall
This method increases the game difficulty if the condition of the live score is dividable by 50 or equal to 100 is met.
increaseScore(int) - Method in class data.score.Score
This method increases the score.
increaseSpeed() - Method in class model.ball.Ball
This method increases the movement speed of the ball by increasing the horizontal and vertical movement speed of the ball.
